alert.note: Alert for Fairfield; Lexington; Richland (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 06 at 4:52PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Fairfield, northeastern Lexington and northwestern Richland Counties through 530 PM EDT... At 452 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Jenkinsville to Oak Grove. These storms were nearly stationary. ...Boaters on Lake Murray Should Seek Safe Harbor... HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Columbia, Lexington, West Columbia, Cayce, Irmo, Winnsboro, Springdale, St. Andrews, Highway 6 at Lake Murray Dam, Red Bank, VC Summer Nuclear Station, Oak Grove, Fairfield County Airport, Columbia International University, Jenkinsville, Harbison State Forest, Riverbanks Zoo, Columbia Metro Airport, SC State Fair Grounds and West Columbia Riverwalk. This includes the following highways... Interstate 126 between mile markers 0 and 3. Interstate 20 in South Carolina between mile markers 52 and 69. Interstate 26 between mile markers 91 and 115. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
